articles.description: John Virgo, who co-presented TV show Big Break and commentated on the BBC for 47 years, has died.
articles.title: John Virgo dies aged 79

articles.description: In a wide-ranging interview, Brendon McCullum talks about Harry Brook's altercation with a nightclub bouncer and the criticism of England's off-field behaviour.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum on Harry Brook, Ashes and Noosa trip

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has spoken passionately about children being killed and injured in conflict zones across the world, saying the footage he sees "hurts me".
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss 'hurt' by images of child victims of conflict zones

articles.description: Arsenal have moved a step closer to winning their first major silverware since 2020 by beating Chelsea 4-2 on aggregate in the Carabao Cup semi-final.
articles.title: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly men' tag after beating Chelsea in EFL Cup semi-final

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how the New England Patriots managed to make such a remarkable turnaround this season to make the Super Bowl, and  if it signals the rise of their 'evil empire'.
articles.title: NFL Super Bowl 60: Are the New England Patriots back? Drake Maye & Mike Vrabel the new Tom Brady & Bill Belichick

articles.description: Lamine Yamal scores and Marcus Rashford claims an assist as holders Barcelona defeat Albacete to advance into the semi-finals of the Copa del Rey.
articles.title: Albacete 1-2 Barcelona: Marcus Rashford has an assist as holders reach Copa del Rey semis

articles.description: James Harden is set to join the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Los Angeles Clippers, with Darius Garland moving in the opposite direction.
articles.title: NBA: James Harden to join Cleveland Cavaliers as part of Darius Garland trade with LA Clippers
Six new faces to watch in Six Nations

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the global stars and stories to follow at Milan-Cortina 2026.
articles.title: Who are the global stars to follow at Milan-Cortina 2026?

articles.description: Figure skater Tomas-Llorence Guarino Sabate is optimistic he can perform to music from the Minions films at the Winter Olympics after receiving copyright clearance.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Figure skater Sabate hopeful over Minions music dispute
